description:
Dear Partner, Good Morning!

Greetings from SnapRecruit LLC. We do have urgent requirement for Data Engineer

Job Description:

Job Title/Role

Sr. Data Engineer

Mandatory Skills

Experience in clinical data and analytics solutions.

Clinical / pharma experience.

Hands-on experience implementing data migration and data processing using Azure services, Serverless Architecture, Azure Storage, Data Factory, Azure Stream Analytics, Databricks Azure Data Catalog, Azure DevOps, CI/CD.

Demonstrated experience building Data Pipelines , Data Streams and optimizing data platforms.

Experience Azure data services and languages to store and produce cleansed and enhanced datasets.

Strong knowledge in Pyspark, SQL, Scala, Data Bricks.

Job Description

Experience in clinical data and analytics solutions.

Hands-on experience implementing data migration and data processing using Azure services, Serverless Architecture, Azure Storage, Data Factory, Azure Stream Analytics, Databricks Azure Data Catalog, Azure DevOps, CI/CD.

Demonstrated experience building Data Pipelines , Data Streams and optimizing data platforms.

Experience Azure data services and languages to store and produce cleansed and enhanced datasets.

Strong knowledge in Pyspark, SQL, Scala, Data Bricks.

Experience in agile delivery methodology in a leading role as part of a wider team.

Provide direction, guidance, and expertise to a team of database developers , and analysts, as well as collaborating with stakeholders.

Strong team collaboration and experience working with remote teams.

Clinical / pharma experience.
